name: Blarp! (itch)
description:
Pilot a space ship against the evil Squiddies. Try to balance fuel for shields and thrust, while trying to save enough for weapons.                                       

Alt-Enter for full screen. WASD to fly. Mouse to shoot. Fuel is used while moving and shooting. Coast to regain fuel or land to refuel faster. Warning! Shooting while landed takes more energy and you are vulnerable while landed and at zero fuel.

Crashing into Squiddies kills them, but grants you no points. Shooting a Squiddie is 5 points. See how many Squiddies you can BLARP before you die!!

-Have fun!
